verses.name: Matthew 9:24
verses.text: He said unto them, Give place: for the maid is not dead, but sleepeth. And they laughed him to scorn.

verses.name: Matthew 9:25
verses.text: But when the people were put forth, he went in, and took her by the hand, and the maid arose.

verses.name: Matthew 9:26
verses.text: And the fame hereof went abroad into all that land.

verses.name: Matthew 9:27
verses.text: And when Jesus departed thence, two blind men followed him, crying, and saying, Thou Son of David, have mercy on us.
